mapper.select: select ajb.*,bd.dept_name from anbiao_jiashiyuan_baoxian ajb LEFT JOIN blade_dept bd ON bd.id = ajb.ajb_dept_ids where ajb_delete = 0 and ajb.ajb_insured_ids= #{driverId} ORDER BY ajb.ajb_insurance_period_end DESC LIMIT 1

select DISTINCT u.id,p.id as postId,gangwei.id as gangweiid,bumen.id as bumenid,jigou.id as jigouid, u.name as name, u.real_name as realName, u.account, CONCAT(jigou.dept_name,case when bumen.dept_name is null then '' else concat('/',bumen.dept_name)end,'/',gangwei.dept_name) as deptName, gangwei.dept_name as postName, u.phone, case when ifnull(u.is_deleted,0) = 0 then '启用' when ifnull(u.is_deleted,0) = 1 then '删除' when ifnull(u.is_deleted,0) = 2 then '禁用' end as zhuangtai, u.create_time as createTimes, u.update_time as updateTimes, ux.jiatingdizhi as address, u.password from blade_user u INNER JOIN anbiao_personnel ux on ux.userid = u.id and ux.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN blade_post p ON u.id=p.user_id INNER JOIN blade_dept gangwei ON p.post_id=gangwei.id LEFT JOIN blade_dept bumen ON gangwei.parent_id = bumen.id and bumen.extend_type='部门' INNER JOIN blade_dept jigou ON (gangwei.parent_id=jigou.id or bumen.parent_id=jigou.id) and jigou.extend_type='机构' INNER JOIN blade_dept shangji ON locate(shangji.tree_code,jigou.tree_code)>0 and shangji.id=#{deptId} where u.is_deleted != 1 and IFNULL(account,'') != ''

select DISTINCT a.id, a.dept_name, b.jigoubianma from( SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.is_deleted FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' AND shangji.id= #{deptId} )a INNER JOIN( select dept_id,jigoubianma from anbiao_organization where isdelete = 0 and jigouleixing in ('qiye','geti') )b on a.id = b.dept_id ORDER BY a.dept_name asc

SELECT avb_ids AS avbIds, avb_dept_ids AS deptId, e.cheliangpaizhao AS cheliangpaizhao, avb_av_ids AS avbAvIds, avbm_risk, avbm_name, d.avbm_insurance_amount AS avbmInsuranceAmount, d.avbm_basic_premium AS avbmBasicPremium, avb_insure_name AS avbInsureName, avb_insurance_period_end FROM anbiao_vehicle_baoxian INNER JOIN (
) a on a.id=avb_dept_ids INNER JOIN anbiao_organization k on a.id = k.dept_id and k.jigouleixing in('qiye','geti') AND k.jigouleixing IN ( 'qiye', 'geti' ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM anbiao_vehicle_baoxian_mingxi WHERE avbm_risk = "交强险" AND avbm_name = "交强险" ) d ON avb_ids = d.avbm_avb_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle e ON e.id = avb_av_ids WHERE avb_delete = '0'
AND e.is_deleted = '0' -- AND e.cheliangpaizhao NOT LIKE '%挂' and avbm_risk is not null
ORDER BY e.cheliangpaizhao

SELECT avb_ids AS avbIds, avb_dept_ids AS deptId, e.cheliangpaizhao AS cheliangpaizhao, avb_av_ids AS avbAvIds, f.avbm_risk, f.avbm_name , f.avbm_insurance_amount AS avbmInsuranceAmount, f.avbm_basic_premium AS avbmBasicPremium, avb_insure_name AS avbInsureName, avb_insurance_period_end as avbInsurancePeriodEnd
FROM anbiao_vehicle_baoxian INNER JOIN (
) a on a.id=avb_dept_ids INNER JOIN anbiao_organization k on a.id = k.dept_id and k.jigouleixing in('qiye','geti') LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_baoxian_mingxi f ON avb_ids = f.avbm_avb_ids and avbm_risk = "车险" and (avbm_name = "机动车损失险" or avbm_name = "三者责任保险" or avbm_name = "机动车车上人员责任保险(司机)" or avbm_name = "机动车车上人员责任保险（司机)" or avbm_name = "机动车车上人员责任保险（司机）" or avbm_name = "机动车车上人员责任保险(司机）" or avbm_name = "机动车车上人员责任保险(乘客)" or avbm_name = "机动车车上人员责任保险（乘客)" or avbm_name = "机动车车上人员责任保险（乘客）" or avbm_name = "机动车车上人员责任保险(乘客）") LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle e ON e.id = avb_av_ids WHERE avb_delete = '0'
AND e.is_deleted = '0' and f.avbm_risk is not null
ORDER BY e.cheliangpaizhao

SELECT avb_ids AS avbIds, avb_dept_ids AS deptId, e.cheliangpaizhao AS cheliangpaizhao, avb_av_ids AS avbAvIds, f.avbm_risk, f.avbm_name , SUM(f.avbm_insurance_amount) AS avbmInsuranceAmount, SUM(f.avbm_basic_premium) AS avbmBasicPremium
FROM anbiao_vehicle_baoxian INNER JOIN (
) a on a.id=avb_dept_ids INNER JOIN anbiao_organization k on a.id = k.dept_id and k.jigouleixing in('qiye','geti') LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_baoxian_mingxi f ON avb_ids = f.avbm_avb_ids and avbm_risk = "车险" and (avbm_name = "机动车损失险" or avbm_name = "三者责任保险" or avbm_name = "机动车车上人员责任保险(司机)" or avbm_name = "机动车车上人员责任保险(乘客)" )
LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle e ON e.id = avb_av_ids WHERE avb_delete = '0'
AND e.is_deleted = '0' and f.avbm_risk is not null
and e.cheliangpaizhao=#{cheliangpaizhao}
GROUP BY e.cheliangpaizhao

SELECT avb_ids AS avbIds, avb_dept_ids AS deptId, e.cheliangpaizhao AS cheliangpaizhao, avb_av_ids AS avbAvIds, f.avbm_risk, f.avbm_name , f.avbm_insurance_amount AS avbmInsuranceAmount, f.avbm_basic_premium AS avbmBasicPremium, avb_insure_name AS avbInsureName, avb_insurance_period_end as avbInsurancePeriodEnd
FROM anbiao_vehicle_baoxian INNER JOIN (
) a on a.id=avb_dept_ids INNER JOIN anbiao_organization k on a.id = k.dept_id and k.jigouleixing in('qiye','geti') LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_baoxian_mingxi f ON avb_ids = f.avbm_avb_ids and f.avbm_risk = "超赔险" and (f.avbm_name = "超赔险" or f.avbm_name ="交强险")
LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle e ON e.id = avb_av_ids WHERE avb_delete = '0'
AND e.is_deleted = '0' and f.avbm_risk is not null
ORDER BY e.cheliangpaizhao

SELECT avb_ids AS avbIds, avb_dept_ids AS deptId, e.cheliangpaizhao AS cheliangpaizhao, avb_av_ids AS avbAvIds, f.avbm_risk, f.avbm_name , f.avbm_insurance_amount AS avbmInsuranceAmount, f.avbm_basic_premium AS avbmBasicPremium, avb_insure_name AS avbInsureName, avb_insurance_period_end as avbInsurancePeriodEnd
FROM anbiao_vehicle_baoxian INNER JOIN (
) a on a.id=avb_dept_ids INNER JOIN anbiao_organization k on a.id = k.dept_id and k.jigouleixing in('qiye','geti') LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_baoxian_mingxi f ON avb_ids = f.avbm_avb_ids and f.avbm_risk != "超赔险" and f.avbm_risk != "交强险" and f.avbm_name != "超赔险" and f.avbm_name != "交强险" and f.avbm_name != "机动车损失险" and f.avbm_name != "三者责任保险" and f.avbm_name != "机动车车上人员责任保险(司机)" and f.avbm_name != "机动车车上人员责任保险（司机)" and f.avbm_name != "机动车车上人员责任保险（司机）" and f.avbm_name != "机动车车上人员责任保险(司机）" and f.avbm_name != "机动车车上人员责任保险(乘客)" and f.avbm_name != "机动车车上人员责任保险（乘客)" and f.avbm_name != "机动车车上人员责任保险（乘客）" and f.avbm_name != "机动车车上人员责任保险(乘客）"
LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle e ON e.id = avb_av_ids WHERE avb_delete = '0'
AND e.is_deleted = '0' and f.avbm_risk is not null
ORDER BY e.cheliangpaizhao

SELECT a.id AS deptId, a.dept_name, IFNULL(b.jiashiyuanrenshu,0) as jiashiyuanrenshu, IFNULL(c.cheliangshuliang,0) as cheliangshuliang, IFNULL(g.huoguizongbaoxianjine,0) as huoguizongbaoxianjine, IFNULL(g.huoguizongbaofeijine,0) as huoguizongbaofeijine, IFNULL(g.huoguiInsuranceDays,"/") as huoguiInsuranceDays, IFNULL(h.anzezongbaoxianjine,0) as anzezongbaoxianjine, IFNULL(h.anzezongbaofeijine,0) as anzezongbaofeijine, IFNULL(h.anzeInsuranceDays,"/") as anzeInsuranceDays, IFNULL(j.qitazongbaoxianjine,0) as qitazongbaoxianjine, IFNULL(j.qitazongbaofeijine,0) as qitazongbaofeijine, IFNULL(j.qitaInsuranceDays,"/") as qitaInsuranceDays, (IFNULL(d.yiwaixianzongbaoxianjine,0)+IFNULL(i.qitazongbaoxianjine,0)) as renyuanzongbaoxianjine, (IFNULL(d.yiwaixianzongbaofeijine,0)+IFNULL(i.qitazongbaofeijine,0)) as renyuanzongbaofeijine, (IFNULL(e.chexianzongbaoxianjine,0)+IFNULL(f.jiaoqiangxianzongjine,0)+IFNULL(k.chaopeizongbaoxianjine,0)) as cheliangzongbaoxianjine, (IFNULL(e.chexianzongbaofeijine,0)+IFNULL(f.jiaoqiangxianzongbaofeijine,0)+IFNULL(k.chaopeizongbaofeijine,0)) as cheliangzongbaofeijine
FROM ( ) a INNER JOIN anbiao_organization k on a.id = k.dept_id and k.jigouleixing in('qiye','geti') LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dept_id, COUNT( id ) AS jiashiyuanrenshu FROM anbiao_jiashiyuan WHERE isdelete = 0 GROUP BY dept_id) b ON b.dept_id = a.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dept_id, COUNT( id ) AS cheliangshuliang FROM anbiao_vehicle WHERE is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY dept_id) c ON c.dept_id = a.id
-- 意外险 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ajb_dept_ids, sum(d.yiwaixianzongbaoxianjine) as yiwaixianzongbaoxianjine , sum(d.yiwaixianzongbaofeijine) as yiwaixianzongbaofeijine FROM anbiao_jiashiyuan_baoxian LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ajbm_avb_ids,SUM( ajbm_company_amount ) AS yiwaixianzongbaoxianjine, SUM( ajbm_basic_premium ) AS yiwaixianzongbaofeijine FROM anbiao_jiashiyuan_baoxian_mingxi WHERE ajbm_risk = "意外险" GROUP BY ajbm_avb_ids) d ON ajb_ids = d.ajbm_avb_ids WHERE ajb_delete=0
and ajb_insurance_period_start >= #{date}
GROUP BY ajb_dept_ids ) d ON d.ajb_dept_ids = a.id
-- 其他（人员） LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ajb_dept_ids, sum(d.qitazongbaoxianjine) as qitazongbaoxianjine , sum(d.qitazongbaofeijine) as qitazongbaofeijine FROM anbiao_jiashiyuan_baoxian LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ajbm_avb_ids,SUM( ajbm_company_amount ) AS qitazongbaoxianjine, SUM( ajbm_basic_premium ) AS qitazongbaofeijine FROM anbiao_jiashiyuan_baoxian_mingxi WHERE ajbm_risk != "意外险" GROUP BY ajbm_avb_ids) d ON ajb_ids = d.ajbm_avb_ids WHERE ajb_delete=0
and ajb_insurance_period_start >= #{date}
GROUP BY ajb_dept_ids ) i ON i.ajb_dept_ids = a.id
-- 车险 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT avb_dept_ids, sum(d.chexianzongbaoxianjine) as chexianzongbaoxianjine, sum(d.chexianzongbaofeijine ) as chexianzongbaofeijine FROM anbiao_vehicle_baoxian LEFT JOIN ( SELECT avbm_avb_ids,sum(avbm_insurance_amount) AS chexianzongbaoxianjine, sum(avbm_basic_premium) AS chexianzongbaofeijine FROM anbiao_vehicle_baoxian_mingxi WHERE avbm_risk != "交强险" GROUP BY avbm_avb_ids) d ON avb_ids = d.avbm_avb_ids WHERE avb_delete=0
and avb_insurance_period_start >= #{date}
GROUP BY avb_dept_ids )e on e.avb_dept_ids =a.id
-- 交强险 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT avb_dept_ids, sum(d.jiaoqiangxianzongjine) as jiaoqiangxianzongjine, sum(d.jiaoqiangxianzongbaofeijine ) as jiaoqiangxianzongbaofeijine FROM anbiao_vehicle_baoxian LEFT JOIN ( SELECT avbm_avb_ids,sum(avbm_insurance_amount) AS jiaoqiangxianzongjine, sum(avbm_basic_premium) AS jiaoqiangxianzongbaofeijine FROM anbiao_vehicle_baoxian_mingxi WHERE avbm_risk = "交强险" GROUP BY avbm_avb_ids) d ON avb_ids = d.avbm_avb_ids WHERE avb_delete=0
and avb_insurance_period_start >= #{date}
GROUP BY avb_dept_ids )f on f.avb_dept_ids =a.id
-- 货柜险 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT avb_dept_ids, avb_insurance_period_end, sum(d.avbm_insurance_amount) as huoguizongbaoxianjine, sum(d.avbm_basic_premium ) as huoguizongbaofeijine, CASE WHEN IFNULL( DATEDIFF( avb_insurance_period_end, avb_insurance_period_start ), '' )= '' THEN 0 ELSE DATEDIFF( avb_insurance_period_end, avb_insurance_period_start ) END AS huoguiInsuranceDays FROM anbiao_dept_baoxian LEFT JOIN anbiao_dept_baoxian_mingxi d ON avb_ids = d.avbm_avb_ids WHERE avb_delete=0 and avbm_risk = "货柜险" GROUP BY avb_dept_ids )g on g.avb_dept_ids =a.id
-- 安责险 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT avb_dept_ids, avb_insurance_period_end, sum(d.avbm_insurance_amount) as anzezongbaoxianjine, sum(d.avbm_basic_premium ) as anzezongbaofeijine, CASE WHEN IFNULL( DATEDIFF( avb_insurance_period_end, avb_insurance_period_start ), '' )= '' THEN 0 ELSE DATEDIFF( avb_insurance_period_end, avb_insurance_period_start ) END AS anzeInsuranceDays FROM anbiao_dept_baoxian LEFT JOIN anbiao_dept_baoxian_mingxi d ON avb_ids = d.avbm_avb_ids WHERE avb_delete=0 and avbm_risk = "安责险" GROUP BY avb_dept_ids )h on h.avb_dept_ids =a.id
-- 超陪险 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT avb_dept_ids, avb_insurance_period_end, sum(d.chaopeizongbaoxianjine) as chaopeizongbaoxianjine, sum(d.chaopeizongbaofeijine ) as chaopeizongbaofeijine, CASE WHEN IFNULL( DATEDIFF( avb_insurance_period_end, avb_insurance_period_start ), '' )= '' THEN 0 ELSE DATEDIFF( avb_insurance_period_end, avb_insurance_period_start ) END AS anzeInsuranceDays FROM anbiao_dept_baoxian LEFT JOIN ( SELECT avbm_avb_ids,sum(avbm_insurance_amount) AS chaopeizongbaoxianjine, sum(avbm_basic_premium) AS chaopeizongbaofeijine FROM anbiao_dept_baoxian_mingxi WHERE avbm_risk = "超赔险" GROUP BY avbm_avb_ids) d ON avb_ids = d.avbm_avb_ids WHERE avb_delete=0
GROUP BY avb_dept_ids )k on k.avb_dept_ids =a.id
-- 其他（企业） LEFT JOIN ( SELECT avb_dept_ids, avb_insurance_period_end, sum(d.avbm_insurance_amount) as qitazongbaoxianjine, sum(d.avbm_basic_premium ) as qitazongbaofeijine, CASE WHEN IFNULL( DATEDIFF( avb_insurance_period_end, avb_insurance_period_start ), '' )= '' THEN 0 ELSE DATEDIFF( avb_insurance_period_end, avb_insurance_period_start ) END AS qitaInsuranceDays FROM anbiao_dept_baoxian LEFT JOIN anbiao_dept_baoxian_mingxi d ON avb_ids = d.avbm_avb_ids WHERE avb_delete=0 and avbm_risk != "安责险" and avbm_risk != "货柜险" GROUP BY avb_dept_ids )j on j.avb_dept_ids =a.id
